channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Microsoft ‘Security Disaster’ Looms—400 Million Windows Users Must Act
item.description: Upgrade now to stay safe — what to know.

item.title: ‘Escape From Tarkov’ Patch Notes Introduce Softcore Mode
item.description: A new Escape From Tarkov patch has arrived and has made the game easier than ever before thanks to the introduction of a softcore mode.
